Reviews.Title: Above expectations
Reviews.Author: Peter Crum "Pinoncito"
Reviews.Content: This thing is very cute.  You can even mount it on top of a hot shoe! It came very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Perfect accessory for dolls
Reviews.Author: Robinhoo
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these Pentax keychain cameras. They're exactly the right size to be accessories for 18" dolls like American Girls. Very realistic-looking, and a great price. If you have a child who wants her or his doll to be a photographer, this is perfect.

ProductInfo.Features:
Camera measures approximately 2" wide
Plastic construction
Removable metal clasp chain
Includes hot shoe adapter to connect mini camera to your real DSLR/SLR
Gashapon ball packaging
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Capsule Mini Camera Keychain K-5 Limited Silver Camera
